title: Unicode issue with PY3.5
body:
PY3.5 test on container from #2242 fails with unicode error

```
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.tests.test_config.test_something
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 492, in newfunc
    create_tree(d, tree, archives_leading_dir=archives_leading_dir)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 174, in create_tree
    create_tree(full_name, load, archives_leading_dir=archives_leading_dir)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 174, in create_tree
    create_tree(full_name, load, archives_leading_dir=archives_leading_dir)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 182, in create_tree
    f.write(load)
UnicodeEncodeError: 'ascii' codec can't encode character '\u306e' in position 94: ordinal not in range(128)

======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.tests.test_utils.test_read_csv_lines_tsv_unicode
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/nose/case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/datalad/tests/utils.py", line 629, in newfunc
    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/datalad/tests/test_utils.py", line 914, in test_read_csv_lines_tsv_unicode
    list(gen),
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/dist-packages/datalad/utils.py", line 1455, in read_csv_lines
    for row in csv_reader:
  File "/usr/lib/python3.5/encodings/ascii.py", line 26, in decode
    return codecs.ascii_decode(input, self.errors)[0]
UnicodeDecodeError: 'ascii' codec can't decode byte 0xd0 in position 9: ordinal not in range(128)
```
